name: Long Game (DEMO)
description:
An unofficial entry for the Yuri Game Jam!

The year is 18XX, Mary Wright is a grifter participating in her first badger game, a con which neither she or the others involved know will change their lives forever.

This is only the demo, so none of the romance routes or choices have been implemented, though you are introduced to both romantic options, but the full game will have a lot more in the romance category!

Full game will (hopefully) include:

-2 romance routes!

-Immersive historical story

-better art than the demo (hopefully)!

-lots of being gay, and a healthy dose of crime!

-maybe even a few other love interests

The demo includes:

-Introduction of both of the main romance options

-a spoonful or two of being gay and doing crime

-1000+ words!

-historical story

-medium quality art!
